data.title: AI SWB Noise Suppression
data.description: Meeamiâ€™s AI based Super Wide Band Noise suppression technology is a low power and high performance noise suppression for edge devices such as laptops and mobiles, automotive, wearables. It is also optimized for embedded devices such as DSP mixers for meeting rooms.  You can download our noise suppressing virtual driver application on Windows and Mac for background noise free conferencing and calling experience.
data.heading: MEEAMI

cards.description: Our noise-cancellation technology is a game-changer, capable of eliminating over 50 diverse noise types. From the subtle tick-tock of a clock to the persistent barking of dogs, abrupt door closures, and even the delicate cries of a baby, our solution ensures a serene and distraction-free acoustic environment
cards.title: 50+ noise types cancelled Clock noise, Dog barking, Door closing, baby crying

cards.description: Our Software Development Kit (SDK) offers unparalleled versatility, providing seamless integration across a wide spectrum of platforms. Whether you're developing for Android, iOS, Mac, Windows, or Linux, our SDK empowers developers with the tools and resources needed to effortlessly incorporate advanced functionalities into their applications
cards.title: Delivered as SDK on Android, iOS, Mac, Windows, Linux

cards.description: Our software solution offers unparalleled versatility, capable of running on a wide range of processor architectures, including Intel, AMD, M1, Snapdragon, as well as DSP (Digital Signal Processor) chips. This compatibility ensures that our software can seamlessly integrate into a diverse array of computing devices and platforms.
cards.title: Can run on application processors (Intel, AMD, M1, Snapdragon) or DSP chips

cards.description: Our cutting-edge technology is engineered to deliver lightning-fast, low-latency performance for real-time communications. Whether you're engaged in video conferencing, online gaming, or any other time-sensitive interaction, our solution ensures that information flows seamlessly and without delay
cards.title: Low latency for real time communications

data.heading: Explore
data.title: Try it now to transform your soundscapes like never before.
data.description: Unlock the power of audio AI with our state-of-the-art tool designed to revolutionize your sound experiences. Embrace the future of sound with our audio AI tool and discover a world of endless possibilities at your fingertips.

data.heading: Use Cases
data.description: By intelligently analyzing and reducing background noise, it ensures that conversations, meetings, recordings, and more are crystal-clear and distraction-free
data.title: Remove Background Noise
